man
1975,  [Instituto Lingüístico de Verano],  Frases sencillas, tarasco-español‎[1], third edition, page 5:Maru achäticha ánchikuaɹisʌndi kámpuɹisʌ.Some men work in the field.

river
1975,  [Instituto Lingüístico de Verano],  Frases sencillas, tarasco-español‎[1], third edition, page 8:Sábadu jimbó juchá niuaka ioɹékuaɹu jupani.On Saturday we go to the river to do washing.
